text: A train travels 120 km in 2 hours. What is its average speed?

The perimeter of a rectangle is 60 cm. If its length is 20 cm what is its breadth?

Find the compound interest on ₹10000 at 10% per annum for 3 years
A cone has base radius 7 cm and height 24 cm. What is its volume?

If sin θ = 3/5 and θ is acute what is cos θ?
